name: Yeah, I'm a Vampire
description:
In our game "Yeah, I'm a Vampire" you play as a 12 year old kid who desperately wants to attract their vampire obsessed crush.  By completing different puzzles, collect items to make yourself seem more like a vampire in the hopes that your crush will be swayed by your now vampiric look.

The current available build of the game is an incomplete version to give a taste of what the final game will be like. This will be updated to the final build on the 18th of November 2022.
